summary: This document is a transfer request form from TD Ameritrade for the transfer of shares from Southern Financial LLC to Interactive Brokers. It includes instructions for charitable contributions and third-party transfers, along with account information and a request for the transfer of 180,000 shares of AAPL.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is identified as the account holder for Southern Financial LLC, requesting a transfer of shares.

events.title: Transfer Request
events.description: A request was made to transfer 180,000 shares of AAPL from Southern Financial LLC to Interactive Brokers.

keyFacts: The document includes a transfer request for 180,000 shares of AAPL.
Richard Kahn is the account holder for Southern Financial LLC.
The transfer is being made to Interactive Brokers.
The document outlines instructions for charitable contributions and third-party transfers.
It emphasizes that not all securities are eligible for direct registration.
